constituent: evade, ketchup, flag, mouth, spicy, stand up, vase, ten, needle, road
koohiiStory1: You can try and evade them, but they´ll ketchup with you on the road... Sorry, couldn´t resist it.
koohiiStory2: In order to evade the bear, you lie down on the road, put ketchup on yourself, and play dead.
